attributes.action: For future food security in this country ban all development on agricultural land
attributes.additional_details: With an ever increasing world and UK population, it is recognised that there will be a food crisis in the future. To avoid disaster this country will need to grow as much of its own food as possible. Local planners are still routinely allowing developments on viable food land. This must be stopped. The government must show foresight and act now to protect all farmland.
